sections.title: Bloodrager (Class Overview)
sections.description: Overview of the Bloodrager class including role, alignment, hit die, and starting wealth.

sections.title: Weapon and Armor Proficiency (Bloodrager)
sections.description: Bloodragers are proficient with simple and martial weapons, light and medium armor, and shields (except tower shields). They can cast bloodrager spells in light or medium armor without arcane spell failure.

sections.title: Bloodline (Bloodrager)
sections.description: Each bloodrager chooses a bloodline that grants bloodline powers at 1st, 4th level and every 4 levels thereafter, bonus feats every 3 levels starting at 6th, and additional spells at 7th, 10th, 13th, and 16th levels.

sections.title: Bloodrage (Su) (Bloodrager)
sections.description: The bloodrager can enter bloodrage as a free action, gaining +4 morale bonus to Strength and Constitution, +2 to Will saves, but -2 to AC. Bloodrage lasts 4 + Con modifier rounds per day at 1st level, plus 2 rounds per level thereafter.

sections.title: Fast Movement (Ex) (Bloodrager)
sections.description: A bloodrager's land speed increases by 10 feet when wearing no armor, light armor, or medium armor and not carrying a heavy load.

sections.title: Uncanny Dodge (Ex) (Bloodrager)
sections.description: The bloodrager cannot be caught flat-footed and retains Dexterity bonus to AC against invisible attackers, but can still lose it when immobilized or successfully feinted against.

sections.title: Blood Sanctuary (Su) (Bloodrager)
sections.description: The bloodrager gains a +2 bonus on saving throws against spells cast by himself or his allies.

sections.title: Blood Casting (Su) (Bloodrager)
sections.description: The bloodrager can cast bloodrager spells while bloodraging, including casting defensively and making concentration checks, but cannot cast spells from other classes during bloodrage.

sections.title: Eschew Materials (Bloodrager)
sections.description: The bloodrager gains Eschew Materials as a bonus feat at 4th level.

sections.title: Spell Casting (Bloodrager)
sections.description: Beginning at 4th level, bloodragers can cast arcane spells from the bloodrager spell list using Charisma as their spellcasting ability. They cast spells known without preparation like sorcerers.

sections.title: Improved Uncanny Dodge (Ex) (Bloodrager)
sections.description: The bloodrager cannot be flanked, denying sneak attacks from flanking unless the attacker has at least 4 more rogue levels than the bloodrager has bloodrager levels.

sections.title: Damage Reduction (Ex) (Bloodrager)
sections.description: Starting at 7th level, the bloodrager gains damage reduction 1/-, increasing by 1 every 3 levels thereafter, reducing damage from weapons and natural attacks.

sections.title: Greater Bloodrage (Su) (Bloodrager)
sections.description: At 11th level, bloodrage bonuses increase to +6 Strength/Constitution and +3 Will saves, and the bloodrager can apply a 2nd level or lower bloodrager spell to himself when entering bloodrage.

sections.title: Indomitable Will (Ex) (Bloodrager)
sections.description: The bloodrager gains a +4 bonus on Will saves against enchantment spells while bloodraging, stacking with other bonuses including the bloodrage Will save bonus.

sections.title: Tireless Bloodrage (Su) (Bloodrager)
sections.description: The bloodrager no longer becomes fatigued at the end of his bloodrage.

sections.title: Mighty Bloodrage (Su) (Bloodrager)
sections.description: At 20th level, bloodrage bonuses increase to +8 Strength/Constitution and +4 Will saves, and the spell application from greater bloodrage is no longer limited to 2nd level or lower spells.

sections.title: Empowered Bloodrage (Su) (Bloodrager)
sections.description: At 20th level, the bloodrager can apply two spells to himself when entering bloodrage instead of one.
